column2: (010.gif)You start in square E6 facing East. Move 3 squares forward. Turn 90 degrees clockwise, move two squares forward. Turn 180 degrees anticlockwise. Move 5 squares forward. Turn 90 degrees anticlockwise. Move 4 squares forwards. Turn 90 degrees clockwise. Move two squares backwards. What is the Y COORDINATE of the square you are now in?
